subcategories.name: Self-supervised Visual Representation & Reward
subcategories.what_is_covered: Learning body-invariant visual features and reward functions from unlabeled video for transfer across robots.
subcategories.typical_examples: Cross-embodiment transfer; Video-based reward learning; Self-supervised representation pretraining

subcategories.name: Vision-Language & Universal Action Spaces
subcategories.what_is_covered: Aligning vision, language and control signals into a common latent space usable by many embodiments.
subcategories.typical_examples: Cross-embodiment generalization; Vision-language-action models; Universal action representation

subcategories.name: Navigation-Oriented Embodiment-Agnostic State Spaces
subcategories.what_is_covered: Creating state abstractions that enable different platforms to navigate and transfer policies, including sim-to-real.

subcategories.name: Embodiment-Agnostic Imitation with Trajectory Control
subcategories.what_is_covered: Separating task intent from body details via trajectory-centric control for cross-robot imitation.
subcategories.typical_examples: Cross-Embodiment Imitation; Embodiment-Agnostic Representations; Trajectory-Centric Control

subcategories.name: Motion Retargeting Across Morphologies
subcategories.what_is_covered: Warping recorded motions so robots with different kinematics can reproduce demonstrated skills.

subcategories.name: Video-Based Generative Models
subcategories.what_is_covered: Using 3-D flow and video generation to predict transferable manipulation sequences.
subcategories.typical_examples: 3D flow; Generative video models; Cross-embodiment manipulation

subcategories.name: Multimodal Diffusion Policies
subcategories.what_is_covered: Diffusion-based action sampling that fuses multiple sensing streams for data-efficient transfer.
subcategories.typical_examples: Cross-Embodiment Generalization; Multimodal Diffusion Policies; Data-Efficient Manipulation

subcategories.name: Latent-Space Alignment for Dexterous Manipulation
subcategories.what_is_covered: Aligning grasping data in a shared latent space to learn a single policy usable by varied hands.
subcategories.typical_examples: Morphology-aware grasping; Latent-space alignment; Universal dexterous policy

subcategories.name: Morphology-Agnostic RL & Zero-Shot Transfer
subcategories.what_is_covered: Training policies that ignore morphology differences and transfer to unseen robots without finetuning.
subcategories.typical_examples: Cross-embodiment generalization; Morphology-agnostic reinforcement learning; Zero-shot transfer

subcategories.name: Scalable Demonstration Gathering
subcategories.what_is_covered: Collecting large sets of human or teleoperated demonstrations spanning diverse embodiments.
subcategories.typical_examples: Cross-embodiment learning; Human demonstrations; Scalable data collection
